nodes.text: Treasure Ship Row was a gaudy, wealthy open-air bazaar located in Coronet City, the planetary capital of Corellia. One of many Coronet neighborhoods rich in history, it originated in ancient times, when sea captains still settled disputes with swords and whips. The sewers and tunnels beneath it, however, were home to criminal gangs.

Treasure Ship Row was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Galactic Explorer's Guide, a 2019 reference book written by Jason Fry. Within the Star Wars Legends continuity, it first appeared in Ambush at Corellia, a 1995 novel by Roger MacBride Allen.
